Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Grand Plaza Serviced Apartments in London (Paddington), you'll be minutes from Whiteleys Shopping Centre and close to Royal Albert Hall. This 4-star apartment is close to Imperial College London and Harrods.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 198 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional features include a television in the lobby, tour/ticket assistance, and a picnic area.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2:30 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Whiteleys Shopping Centre - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Kensington Palace - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Electric Cinema - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Portobello Road Market - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Kensington Gardens - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Kensington Roof Gardens - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Holland Park - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Albert Memorial - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Royal Albert Hall - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Hyde Park - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Imperial College London - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Hyde Park Speakers' Corner - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
London Science Museum - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Lord's Cricket Ground - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Westfield London Shopping Centre - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 16.7 km / 10.4 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 18.5 km / 11.5 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 39.8 km / 24.7 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Plaza Serviced Apartments is London (LGW-Gatwick).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Grand Plaza Serviced Apartments are:
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 18.5 km / 11.5 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 39.8 km / 24.7 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Plaza Serviced Apartments is London (LGW-Gatwick).

Message.Text:
STAYS FOR 7 OR MORE THAN 7 NIGHTS MAY HAVE SPECIAL CANCELLATION POLICY, PLEASECONTACT OUR BOOKING DEPARTMENT, OTHERWISE YOUR RESERVATION MAY NOT BE CONFIRMED. / ESTANCIAS DE 7 O MAS NOCHES DE DURACION TIENEN UNA POLITICA DE CANCELACION ESPECIAL, POR FAVOR CONTACTE CON NUESTRO DEPARTAMENTO DE RESERVAS PARA MAS DETALLES, DE LO CONTRARIO SU RESERVA NO SERA CONFIRMADA.

NOTE: THE FIRST NIGHT WILL BE CHARGED TO YOUR CREDIT CARD AT THE TIME OF YOUR BOOKING AS A GUARANTEE. IN CASE OF CANCELLATION, THIS AMOUNT WILL BE FULLY REFUNDED TO YOUR CREDIT CARD IF YOU NOTIFY US AT LEAST 72 HOURS PRIOR TO YOUR ARRIVAL. THIS APPLIES ONLY FOR DIRECT PAYMENT BOOKINGS. / NOTA: LA PRIMERA NOCHE SERA CARGADA A SU TARJETA DE CREDITO COMO GARANTIA. EN CASO DE CANCELACION SE LE DEVOLVERA DICHA CANTIDAD A SU TARJETA DE CREDITO SIEMPRE Y CUANDO RECIBAMOS NOTIFICACION AL MENOS 72 HORAS ANTES DE SU LLEGADA.ESTO APLICA SOLO A RESERVAS DE PAGO DIRECTO EN EL HOTEL.

AS OF 20.06.2016 A SECURITY DEPOSIT OF GBP 200 IS REQUIRED ON ARRIVAL FOR INCIDENTALS OR DAMAGES. THIS DEPOSIT IS FULLY REFUNDABLE UPON CHECK OUT AND SUBJECT TO A DAMAGE INSPECTION OF THE ACCOMMODATION // A PARTIR DEL 20.06.2016SE REQUIERE UN DEPOSITO DE 200 GBP A LA HORA DEL CHECK IN PARA DA¥OS. ESTE DEPOSITO SE DEVOLVERA POR COMPLETO A LA HORA DEL CHECK OUT Y SUJETO A UNA INSPECCION DEL ALOJAMIENTO.

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.

Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. As of 20/6/16, a security deposit of GBP 200 is required on arrival for incidentals or damages. This deposit is fully refundable upon check-out and subject to a damage inspection of the accommodation. WE ARE CURRENTLY IN THE PROCESS OF DOING SOME EXTENSION WORK AT PARK CITY GPK. THE CONSTRUCTION WORK WILL COMMENCE FROM 0900-1700HRS DAILY FROM 13/11/16-31/03/18 IN 3 PHASES, (1st & 2nd phases - completed) NOTE: AIR-CONDITIONING APARTMENT Upgrade to air-conditioning apartment at a surcharge of £50.00 per apartment per night.
